statements: SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_rates;
SELECT customer_id, unsubscribe_date FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE reason='spam';
SELECT customer_id, reason, unsubscribe_date FROM unsubscribe_rates ORDER BY unsubscribe_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE customer_id=100;
SELECT reason, COUNT(*) as total_unsubscribes FROM unsubscribe_rates GROUP BY reason ORDER BY total_unsubscribes DESC;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, unsubscribe_date FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE reason = 'feedback' ORDER BY unsubscribe_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, reason FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE reason = 'opt-out' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_unsubscribes FROM unsubscribe_rates GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_unsubscribes > 1 ORDER BY total_unsubscribes DESC;
SELECT reason, COUNT(*) as total_unsubscribes FROM unsubscribe_rates GROUP BY reason HAVING total_unsubscribes > 0 ORDER BY total_unsubscribes DESC;
SELECT * FROM unsubscribe_rates;
SELECT user_id, unsubscribe_date FROM unsubscribe_rates ORDER BY unsubscribe_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, reason FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE reason IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM disengagement_reasons WHERE reason_description LIKE '%customer%' ORDER BY reason_id;
SELECT DISTINCT reason_description FROM disengagement_reasons;
SELECT user_id, unsubscribe_date, reason FROM unsubscribe_rates WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT reason_description, reason_id FROM disengagement_reasons WHERE reason_id IN (1, 2, 3);

SELECT reason, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM unsubscribe_rates GROUP BY reason ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_unsubscribes FROM unsubscribe_rates GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
